description: Change of use from retail/warehouse (Sui Generis) to residential (C3 Use Class); demolition of the existing building; and redevelopment of the site to provide part-8/part-11 storey residential building with associated services, landscaping and access at 52-54 New Cross Road, SE14 and subject to a Legal Agreement pursuant to S106 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended) dated 14 June 2022
